theme.title: Syncopation (3)
theme.para: In this lesson we continue with syncopation. We are going to practice a new rhythmic pattern, the eighth note followed by a quarter note:

score.music: (score (vers 1.5) (instrument (musicData (clef G)(key C) (time 2 4 noVisible) (n a4 e g+)(n a4 e l g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-) (spacer 20) (barline double) (n a4 e)(n a4 q)(n a4 e) (spacer 20) (barline end) )))

theme.para: Note that the quarter note starts in the weak part of the beat (off-beat) an continues in the first part of the following beat. This is the basis of syncopation.

part.title: Listen and take notice of the differences
part.para: Listen to each measure and pay attention to the newly introduced patterns:
